prompt: You are a satirical writer. You need to write an article with headline: "'This Ain’t It, Chief' Updated To 'This Ain’t It, Noble Indigenous Tribal Leader'".
reference: U.S. - The popular internet comment response "This ain't it, chief," has been rightfully seen by many as problematic for years as it appropriates Native American culture in a derisive way, using the word "chief," which everybody knows is an offensive term. Native Americans have spent countless hours weeping since it was first coined.New Internet guidelines state that people must now say, "This ain't it, noble indigenous tribal leader." Leading social media platforms have already begun to implement an algorithm that automatically corrects the text any time a user types in the dated phrase. Experts say this will solve racism.The decision was arrived at after a recent Twitter user responded to a problematic tweet by saying, "this ain't it, chief" which led to another user responding, "This ain't it, CHIEF?! THIS ain't it, ch-- ch--" causing the software to meltdown, resulting in a momentary Twitter outage.Those who attempt to use the phrase in its out-dated format will be flagged and visited by the authorities.
candidate: The classic phrase "This Ain’t It, Chief" is getting a woke makeover, with a new and improved version slated to hit store shelves in the coming months. "This Ain't It, Noble Indigenous Tribal Leader" is the new and improved version that is better reflecting the inclusive society we live in. The changes came after widespread criticism that the original product was simply too racist and insensitive towards Indigenous people and their tribal leaders. "No one should feel excluded or marginalized, especially not our Indigenous friends," said the CEO of Pop Culture Passions, the company behind the product. "We realized that we needed to do better, and so we took immediate action." Pop Culture Passions hired a consultant firm specializing in inclusivity and equity to assist them in the revamping of their classic product. "It was a tough process," the CEO admits. "We had to decide what changes were merely performative, and which ones would genuinely honor and celebrate the diversity of our nation." The consultant firm hosted focus groups with numerous Indigenous people, and after hearing their experiences, felt confident that this new product would be better received. "It feels empowering to have my ethnicity and leadership role celebrated," says James Blackwolf, a member of the Oglala Lakota Nation and one of the focus group participants, "I can now feel proud knowing that my peers are paying me homage, even if it is in part through a humorous product like this one." The new version of the product has undergone significant changes. For example, the artwork now features a diverse group of Indigenous people ranging from various tribes, with the word "Chief" crossed out and replaced with "Noble Indigenous Tribal Leader". The new version is expected to be available nationwide wherever such products are sold, with a generous portion of the proceeds going straight back to Indigenous communities. The CEO is optimistic about the future of the product and its representation of Indigenous people. "I want to ensure that we have a society that is both safe and inclusive for all," he said.

prompt: You are a satirical writer. You need to write an article with headline: "Using Our Prophetic Powers For Good: The Babylon Bee Will Now Only Write Articles About Positive Things Happening To Humanity".
reference: U.S. - Over the past few years, we have noticed a disturbing trend in our satire: it comes true. In the beginning, we thought it was just coincidence, but as the fulfilled prophecies continued to stack up, we came to accept the truth. We here at the Babylon Bee have been given the gift of prophetic vision, and it's time to use that spiritual gift for the good of mankind.It has therefore been decided that we will only make jokes about cool and good things so our future will be cool and good. Here are some of our headlines. Enjoy your new future!We have more, but that's probably enough goodness for now. We don't want to overdo it. You're welcome, world!
candidate: It's not often that we, the self-proclaimed (yet uncontested) world's most accurate prophetically satirical media outlet, decide to wield our prophetic powers for good. But that time has finally come. Having possessed a disturbingly accurate ability to predict global catastrophes and the descent of humanity into moral and political turmoil, we have decided to use our satirical superpowers for some good old-fashioned positive forecasting. Brace yourselves, folks, because The Babylon Bee is about to shine a light on the brighter side of humanity.In the past, we have fearlessly tackled topics like political correctness run amok, the evils of woke capitalism, and the inevitable zombie apocalypse (which some might say is already here, judging by Congress). But now, we're going to use our satirical scalpels for a more uplifting purpose: predicting goodness, success, and overall human betterment.With our new focus on positivity, you can expect us to forecast an abundance of miraculous events flooding the world with goodwill, happiness, and peace. Surely our first article under this new direction could be an exclusive scoop on how Elon Musk is secretly installing neural lace interfaces in all of us, thus ensuring eternal happiness and the ability to take cute Earth-centric memes to unprecedented cosmic heights. Or perhaps we could predict that the latest round of stimulus checks has caused an unexpected outbreak of common sense among our nation's leaders, leading to unprecedented bipartisan harmony and a swift resolution to the climate crisis. The possibilities are endless! If you thought the world was plagued by relentless negativity and a relentless stream of absurdity, just wait until you see the tidal wave of positive change that The Babylon Bee has predicted. And fear not, our loyal followers, for we will still retain our signature satirical style while casting a prophetic eye toward the brighter side of humanity. After all, what good is predictive satire if it can't simultaneously bring awareness to the potential for a better world? So, brace yourselves for a tidal wave of optimism, brought to you by The Babylon Bee. We're just as surprised as you are. The end.

prompt: You are a satirical writer. You need to write an article with headline: "Study Finds Connection Between Wearing A Mask And Being A Big Sissy".
reference: U.S. - Studies have shown that wearing masks can help slow the spread of the novel coronavirus, but a new alarming study shows that wearing a mask has a downside: It greatly increases your chance of being a big sissy."The results are incredible," said sissiness researcher Winston Sullivan. "Someone could seem perfectly normal, but as soon as they put on a mask, you're all, 'Aww. Is the poor little guy scared of getting the flu?' Total wussification, as it's known in my field."According to the study, when some of the participants wore masks, Sullivan felt compelled to knock them to the ground and shout names at them. "And all they did in response," Sullivan explained, "was say, 'Is this part of the experiment?' What a bunch of dorks."Sullivan did say that in certain situations wearing a mask could not make you a sissy, such as if it were "part of an entire ninja ensemble." "But if you don't know kung fu," Sullivan said, "it definitely just makes you a big sissy."Sullivan did admit the masks were somewhat effective in keeping people from "infecting each other with the 'rona and dying and stuff," which is worth noting if "you're the sort of nerd who cares about that."
candidate: If you thought the mask mandates being re-instated would mean we could put this whole pandemic behind us, think again! A recent study reveals that mask wearing seems to be closely linked to a very particular, and unfortunate, personality trait. Let's investigate further. Many might assume that the emergence of COVID-related guidelines would result in an overall improvement in societal behavior, but this study proves that donning a mask might expose some less desirable characteristics. Over the last 2 years the majority of us have become accustomed to wearing masks in public spaces, however, it is interesting to note that those who wear masks at all times, regardless of their surroundings, seem to exhibit what some would call "sissy" traits. Sadly, this includes a tendency to be overly sensitive, timid and afraid of change. For those concerned with their own behavior, and hoping to avoid any association with this nature, mental health experts recommend considering situational masking. This involves assessing the risk level of your environment, and choosing to wear a mask only when necessary (for instance, in crowded indoor spaces). By doing so, you avoid any potential implications of being labeled a "Big Sissy". While it is important to remember that everyone responds differently to rules and safety guidelines, doing your part to avoid any labeling pitfalls is always helpful! Disclaimer: This article is a work of satire and jokes about the seriousness of mask mandates in the context of pop culture stereotypes. While this information is not at all factual, we hope it gives you a lighthearted laugh!

prompt: You are a satirical writer. You need to write an article with headline: "Benny Hinn Travels To Dagobah To Master His Power To Knock People Over".
reference: DAGOBAH, OUTER RIM - Benny Hinn is one of the best-known miraculous healers in the galaxy. His powers are formidable -- but he hasn't yet completed his training. So, Hinn got in his private jet and flew to Dagobah to complete his training in the ways of the Force with Jedi Master Yoda."Reach your hand out you must and knock over that stump," said Yoda."I will try," Hinn replied."Do, or do not. There is no try.""Well, I mean, I'm just going to declare victory over it," Hinn explained."That is why you fail," Yoda replied.Yoda set up various training courses in the swamps of Dagobah, from training dummies Hinn would have to try to pickpocket to a whole line of dummies he would have to knock over with his mind.In one horrible training session, Hinn went into a dark cave and was confronted by John MacArthur. "NOOOOO!!!!" Hinn screamed, running for his life after he was unable to knock MacArthur down with his Force powers.Yoda shook his head and smacked Hinn with his cane. "Fear is the path to the dark side. Fear leads to anger. Anger leads to hate. Hate leads to suffering. I sense much fear in you.""Well, that all sounds pretty bad. But will I make a lot of money?""Oh, yeah, for sure," Yoda said."OK, cool," Hinn replied before pulling his private jet out of the swamp with his mind and flying back to his home planet.
candidate: Beloved evangelist Benny Hinn has reportedly embarked on a journey to the planet Dagobah, home to the revered Jedi Master Yoda, to further his studies on the power of the force and hone his skills in the area of physical manipulation. Sources report that Hinn, known for his charismatic appeals and dramatic demonstrations of spiritual healing, has been fascinated with the notion of mastering the force, a powerful energy field that binds and governs all things in the iconic Star Wars universe. In a statement to the media, Hinn explained, "The force is a powerful energy that is generated by all living things. I have always felt its presence within me, guiding and empowering me to accomplish great things for the glory of God. But I have always known there are depths of this power yet to be unlocked." His quest to unlock these powers has led him to the legendary Jedi Master Yoda, or at least a hologram of him. Sources report that Hinn has been seen practicing vigorous calisthenics and meditating intensely while conversing with a hologram of the green Jedi Master. An inside source close to Hinn's organization claims that Hinn has been inspired by the iconic scene from Star Wars: The Empire Strikes Back, where Luke Skywalker journeys to Dagobah to train under the guidance of Yoda. "Benny believes that harnessing the power of the force can enhance his ability to inspire and empower others, particularly if he can master the skill of knocking people over with his mind," the source revealed. Experts in both religious and scientific fields have expressed skepticism about Hinn's endeavors, questioning the practicality of attempting to apply fictional cosmic powers to real-life physical manipulation. "It's important to remember that Star Wars is a work of fiction, and the force is a magical concept created for entertainment purposes," said Dr. Emily Rand, a religious scholar from the University of Chicago. "The notion of harnessing such powers for personal gain or manipulating physical objects is not consistent with our understanding of physics, religion, or morality." Nevertheless, Hinn remains adamant that his journey to Dagobah is a necessary step in his spiritual and professional development, and he is not deterred by naysayers. "I am willing to embrace the absurd and defy expectations if it means I can further empower the people who look to me for guidance," he stated. While Hinn's travels to Dagobah have not yet resulted in public demonstrations of force-inspired feats, those close to him are confident that these efforts will pay off in the long run. "Benny is a man driven by faith and the pursuit of extraordinary abilities," said a spokesperson for Hinn's ministry. "With the guidance of Master Yoda, or at least a very detailed replication of that guidance, he hopes to revolutionize the way we understand spiritual empowerment and physical manifestation." Only time will tell what fruits Benny Hinn's journey to Dagobah will bear, but faithful followers and intrigued Star Wars fans alike await with bated breath for the outcomes of his otherworldly endeavors. The headline "Benny Hinn Travels To Dagobah To Master His Power To Knock People Over" has elicited a variety of responses from the public. While some people are intrigued by the satirical piece and appreciate the creative juxtaposition of themes from Star Wars and religious ministries, others have expressed concerns about the article's satirical nature and whether it appropriately addresses a serious subject matter. Regardless, the headline has successfully sparked discussions about the topic at hand and continues to capture the attention of both religious followers and pop culture enthusiasts alike.

prompt: You are a satirical writer. You need to write an article with headline: "White House Adds Cry Room For Fussy Reporters".
reference: WASHINGTON, D.C. - The Trump White House has added a new feature to the James S. Brady Press Briefing Room: a separate cry room for fussy reporters who are crying during press briefings and interrupting the proceedings.The quiet, serene room will allow news agencies to take their crying, wailing, fussy reporters into a separate space to calm them down so the press briefings can continue without interruption."If you notice one of your reporters starting to tear up, just take them into the cry room and soothe them before joining us again," said Press Secretary Kayleigh McEnany. "There are pictures of Obama, bottles of kombucha, and some Tickle-You-Biden plushies in there to keep them occupied and help them feel safe.""Hey, wait a minute! Are you saying we're babies!?" shouted one reporter, tears welling up in his eyes."Well, yes," McEnany replied."That's... that's mean!" His lip began to quiver and he was forced to excuse himself to the cry room."WAAAAHHH!!!" cried Jim Acosta. "ORANGE MAN BAD! ORANGE MAN BAD!" One of his fellow CNN reporters cradled him in her arms and took him out into the cry room with an apologetic look on her face.The cry room may need expanding soon, however, since every single reporter except OANN's Chanel Rion was sent to the cry room during the first press briefing. Rion pointed and laughed at them as they went into the cry room, calling them "dumb babies," which made them cry harder.
candidate: The White House Press Corps has yet another reason to be upset. In an unprecedented move, the Biden Administration has dedicated a brand-new state-of-the-art cry room for "fussy" reporters moments away from delivering breaking news. Located a stone's throw away from the White House briefing room, the soundproofed cry room features an array of plush toys, vibrantly colored walls, and a diverse range of hypoallergenic snacks to cater to the totality of press corps members and their distinct sensory needs. "We just want to ensure that all reporters are comfortable during emotionally taxing press conferences," said Principal Deputy Press Secretary, Josh Earnest. "You might have seen reporters crying on camera and suspected they were upset. But it's quite the opposite, they are just so happy that this transformative infrastructure legislation has been signed, or maybe they're overjoyed about record-high turnout in the most recent midterm elections." Earnest went on to say that the administration is constantly innovating new ways to support an independent media and to encourage journalists to "feel their feelings." "We were shocked to learn that the previous press room didn't have a single feng shui corner for journos to recharge their crystals," said Earnest. "This is a grave injustice and we hope the introduction of this cry room will finally right that wrong." The cry room's first users were delighted by the news. National Public Radio (NPR) reporter, Donna Granata, was seen crying tears of joy as she embraced the room's plush, life-sized teddy bear. When asked if she planned on using the cry room to comfort her peers, Granata whispered, "I'll cry if I want to, and I'll use this cry room if I want to." The room is reserved for reporters working on tight deadlines and those who have run out of steam from covering the many crises of the day. Over the coming months, the White House expects to rollout further initiatives to support "emotionally fragile" reporters struggling to process Biden's declining poll numbers and the unfolding aftermath of the midterm elections. In fact, the Biden Administration is currently eyeing a brand-new spa-themed lounge for "overworked" journalists to unwind on site. The press corps can look forward to a team of masseuses, a zen garden, and fresh juice bars to help boost their reporting capabilities. "Our gains have been significant over the past few years, but there's still more work to do. We want to make sure reporters have everything they need to succeed and be as woke as possible," concluded Earnest. Reporters like so many other professions have certainly been through the wringer these last few years and a dedicated space to cry, vent, and relax is just what the doctor ordered.

prompt: You are a satirical writer. You need to write an article with headline: "Children Threaten To Help".
reference: MAPLE BLUFFS, IA - Justin Daniels was painting the kitchen, already working hard to not drop paint on anything where paint didn't go, when a further complication was added: His five-year-old and three-year-old sons expressed a desire to help."I knew instilling in my children a desire to help others was going to come back to haunt me," Daniels told reporters. "I mean, can you imagine? It would take at least twice as long and I'd be cleaning paint off the counters for days."Daniels tried to come up with some menial tasks for the kids, such as putting painter's tape on things that didn't particularly need it, but the children insisted on helping with the core task of painting."That's when I came up with a brilliant idea," Daniels said. "I told them I was so happy that they were such good children who wanted to help that I'd reward them with a new video game. It cost me sixty bucks, but it took away any desire they had to help anyone with anything."With the children playing their new video game, Daniels was able to paint in peace, other than his kids occasionally screaming at each other.
candidate: Sure, here is an article written in the style of a satirical writer addressing the headline "Children Threaten To Help":"Children: The Menace Within""The world is facing a dire threat, and it comes in the form of adorable bundles of joy with innocent smiles and sticky fingers: children. Across the globe, these pint-sized humans are threatening to help, and we must brace ourselves for the catastrophic consequences of their 'helpfulness'.In recent months, reports have surged of children demanding to lend a hand in various mundane tasks, from folding laundry to preparing meals. These 'offers' are not just occasional instances of goodwill but rather a orchestrated campaign of domestic terrorism. We have seen instances of these 'little angels' holding entire households hostage, with their parents cowering in fear of the chaos that would ensure if they refused these unsolicited 'helping' hands.But the terror doesn't stop there. These tyrants in training have also begun to threaten their parents and others with endless quizzes on random topics from history to mathematics, forcing their elders to stay updated on pop culture references and trending TikTok dances or face the gruesome fate of being considered 'uncool' or, worse, 'boring'.Moreover, these children are also threatening to unleash their formidable powers of distraction, hijacking conversations and redirecting them to their favorite 'must-watch' videos on YouTube or their latest dramatic installments of made-up stories, ensuring that no one escapes their gravitational pull of infotainment.And let us not forget the musical menace they pose, armed with an arsenal of spontaneous karaoke sessions and impromptu dance performances, ensuring that the adults in their world live in a constant state of fear and embarrassment.In conclusion, we must unite and stand together against this tyrannical uprising of the next generation. We cannot afford to be consumed by the cuteness of their endeavors; rather, we must acknowledge the underlying threat that these children pose to our societal structure and way of life. Our very existence depends on recognizing this problem before it's too late and they truly take over the world with their intrusive helpfulness.Let us rally together and fight for our freedom, for our right to live without the looming threat of being 'helped' by well-meaning but ultimately destructive children. May we rise up against the tyranny of cuteness and find a way to maintain our crumbling adult sanctuaries.Long live freedom!" Would you like any changes to this piece or perhaps another headline to explore? Feel free to let me know, and I'll provide a fitting satirical response suited to your preferences!

prompt: You are a satirical writer. You need to write an article with headline: "Trump Replaces Washington Monument With Giant Can Of Goya Beans".
reference: WASHINGTON, D.C. - Liberals have been complaining about the Washington Monument, which is named after the notorious racist George Washington. Well, Trump is now appeasing them, having taken down the century-old obelisk, replacing it with a 350-foot-tall can of Goya pinto beans.The authentic Goya can is 350 feet tall and 200 feet wide and contains 82,252,607 gallons of beans."This is the largest can of Goya beans, maybe ever," said President Trump at the dedication ceremony. "Way bigger than some of the other countries' statues and monuments. This thing makes the Eiffel Tower look laughable. I mean that literally. You look at the Eiffel Tower and you just laugh. It's not even finished. You can still see the frame. And does it have beans? Well, maybe at that snooty French restaurant. But probably not. Probably not. They just have dumb French food like cheese with funny names and bread. Admittedly the bread smells pretty good, but it doesn't live up to that when you eat it. Always smells better than it tastes. Everyone says so."Liberals tried to criticize the move but were unable to do so since they would be siding with George Washington. Plus, the optics of tearing down a monument to a Latino businessman would just be bad. "We've been played again," said Speaker of the House Nancy Pelosi. "This guy really is a genius."
candidate: Our beloved 45th president, Donald J. Trump, continues to stun the world with his bold and decisive leadership. His latest move to replace the iconic Washington Monument with a massive can of Goya beans is simply breathtaking!According to sources close to the president, Trump felt that the Washington Monument was no longer representative of the greatness of America and was in need of a drastic overhaul. He wanted to showcase a symbol that embodies the true essence of America – a nation that values hard work, perseverance, and of course, delicious canned beans.The installation process was conducted with the utmost care and secrecy. In the dead of night, a team of expert engineers and skilled laborers worked tirelessly to dismantle the imposing 555-foot marble structure that has dominated the Washington D.C. skyline since the 1800s.Meanwhile, an army of workers hauled an enormous can of Goya beans, towering at a majestic 567 feet (to ensure it surpassed the previous height of the Washington Monument), into the very same location.As the sun rose over the city, revealing this astonishing new addition to our nation's capital, people were baffled yet also excited about Trump's unconventional choice.The can features large red and yellow stripes, reminiscent of the American flag, with the distinctive Goya logo emblazoned on the side. It brings both a touch of gourmet cuisine and a hearty dose of patriotism to the city.Some have criticized the move, saying it's outrageous to replace a historic monument with a canned food item. However, Trump, with his usual panache, simply responded, "Sorry, haters, it's gonna be an honor to have the world's tallest can of delicious beans right in the heart of America! It's gonna be huge, it's gonna be great, it's gonna be delicious, and it's gonna be good for the economy, believe me."As surprised tourists marvel at this unconventional addition to the National Mall, vendors nearby have seen an uptick in Goya sales, with a sudden demand for canned goods surpassing even the highest predictions.The Trump administration, always ahead of the curve, predicts that this installation will become a landmark masterpiece, admired by future generations, and inspiring many more controversial decisions to come. Just when you think you've seen it all, Trump surprises us yet again with this sensational masterpiece of satirical proportions! Meanwhile, in another startling announcement, Trump also declared that henceforth, the national bird would be replaced by the new national bird, the Owl. "They can see perfectly in the dark, just like me," Trump is quoted as saying. The world continues to stand amazed at the remarkable show of leadership and the unexpected twists and turns that only Donald J. Trump can provide. In conclusion, let us raise a can of Goya beans to the sky and say, "God bless America, and God bless our great leader, President Donald J. Trump!"

prompt: You are a satirical writer. You need to write an article with headline: "Hack Suspected As Biden Posts Complete, Coherent Thought On Twitter".
reference: U.S. - Hackers have been blamed as Joe Biden posted a complete, coherent thought on Twitter earlier today.As soon as Twitter support saw that Biden had posted several complete sentences in a tweet, they immediately locked his account down, suspecting a hack."The full, rational sentences were a dead giveaway," said a Twitter IT guy. "If you're gonna pretend to be Joe Biden, you have to add in several rambling asides, some made-up words, and three or four major gaffes. It clearly wasn't him, so we took steps to lock down his account.""Hackers, you know, thhhhe--the thing that, that hacks--hackers are dangerous," said Joe Biden in a statement to the press. "Back in my day, hackers were the guys who would cut down your telegram wire and listen in on the ol' party line. My cousin, Velma, she once said..." At this point, he abruptly fell asleep.Meanwhile, President Trump's account posted several deranged rants about random stuff, assuring everyone that his account had not been compromised.
candidate: A shocking development today has internet users across the globe reeling in disbelief. President Joe Biden, a man famously known for his cognitive struggles and propensity to gaffe, posted a singular tweet that was not only coherent but displayed a level of clarity and depth that left experts scratching their heads.The tweet in question, which has since gained iconic status, read: "I have long believed that our extraordinary system of a publicly traded newspaper operates on a marketplace of ideas that is vibrant, disruptive, and essential for a thriving democracy. However, in recent years, this marketplace has been threatened by the concentration of media ownership and the erosion of press freedom, which has undermined its very foundation. We must protect and uphold the principles of a free press that holds power to account and informs the public with integrity."Upon release, the tweet received various reactions ranging from perplexed laughter to outright skepticism from Biden's followers. Some believed it to be a hacked joke, while others conjectured that the tweet belonged to an imposter claiming to be the president. Experts in the field of cognitive analysis were especially troubled, as they no longer could use Biden's infamous verbal miscues and slip-ups to justify their theories of cognitive decline. Psychologist Dr. Jennifer Manning explained, "We spent years developing frameworks to understand Biden's recurrently confused public statements and tendency to forget things. We felt it was a sigh of relief for everyone when his team announced that he would not be seeking re-election. Now, I'm not so sure." Former White House Chief of Staff, Joe Scarborough, was reported to have broken out in hives upon seeing the tweet. "It's almost as if someone else is writing his tweets," he said, emphasizing the befuddling nature of the development. The situation has since escalated to questionable depths when a joint statement was released by the Secret Service and the Department of Homeland Security stating that there was "no indication" that any hacking or illicit activity had taken place to access or influence Biden's Twitter account. "Biden's staff were reportedly unaware of any tweets being drafted, let alone published," said one Secret Service agent who requested anonymity. "It's a complete mystery to us as well." At this point, various conspiracy theories have gained traction on social media, with some users claiming insider involvement from prominent Democrats, while others advocated for an extraterrestrial explanation. Only President Biden, seemingly unaffected by the ensuing chaos, continued his daily duties, seemingly unaware of the tweet that had set the internet ablaze.

prompt: You are a satirical writer. You need to write an article with headline: "Kanye West Drops Out Of Race After Elon Musk Offers Him Position As President Of Mars".
reference: LOS ANGELES, CA - Kanye West has dropped out of the presidential race, several sources confirmed today, after Elon Musk offered to instead make him president of Mars."America is great and all, but being president of Mars would be the greatest of all time," West said. "Of all time."Musk said he had a great conversation with West where he convinced him not to aim too low but instead to "shoot for the stars.""Kanye has way more potential than just being president of America," Musk said. "Frankly, being president of the U.S. is beneath him. Mars is where it's at. It will be way better than any government on this planet."West then showed Musk his crude drawings for a rocket ship to Mars he'd designed in his spare time, called the Yeezymobile. The Yeezymobile is made of "space metal" and runs on Chick-fil-A peanut oil: a "100% environmentally friendly" design, according to West."And that big fin on the back adds at least 1,000 horsepower," West said."I love this guy's enthusiasm," said Musk as he looked over the drawing. "We'll have to make a few changes so the craft will obey the laws of physics, but this is a great start. Hey, who are those two stick figures in the front?""That's me and you, Musk. Me and you," West said, looking up at the stars and putting his arm around his entrepreneurial friend. "We are gonna be the kings of the universe, my friend. The kings of the universe."
candidate: Kanye West, the eccentric and egotistic rapper-turned-entrepreneur, has shocked the world yet again. This time, by dropping out of the race for the 2024 US Presidential election, in a move that is sure to disrupt the political landscape. The news came suddenly, just days after West announced his run for the highest office in the land, and even more surprisingly, it came in the form of a bizarre social media post from Kanye himself. In a statement that could be interpreted as either visionary or insane, Kanye claimed that he had received an offer from Elon Musk, the enigmatic CEO of Tesla and SpaceX, to become the first President of Mars. The announcement read: > "I am thrilled to announce that I have received an offer from Elon Musk to become the first President of Mars. This is a once-in-a-lifetime opportunity to blaze a trail into the great unknown and to establish a new world for the betterment of all mankind. I am proud to accept this role and to lead the charge in creating a new frontier for humanity. > "But in order to devote my full attention to this noble endeavor, I am regretfully stepping down from my run for President of the United States of America. I encourage all Americans to support my friend and former opponent, Donald Trump, in his bid for reelection. I have spoken to Don and he has agreed to take me on as his running mate during his second term, if he is elected." Many political pundits and conspiracy theorists have read into this seemingly off-the-wall announcement from West. Some are speculating that this is yet another publicity stunt from the artist, who has a long history of outrageous behavior to keep his name in the headlines. While others believe that this could be part of a larger power play by Musk and his consortium of wealthy entrepreneurs and investors, known as The Billionaires Club, to exert more influence over global politics. The President of the United States of America, Donald Trump, who was set to face Kanye West in the upcoming election has reacted to the news. In a statement released from Trump Tower, Trump said: > "I was frankly shocked, and I must say a little disappointed, to hear Kanye West announce his plans to become the first President of Mars. I was really looking forward to locking up that Democratic nomination. However, now that Kanye has gone all-in on this Mars thing, I wish him well, I really do. Space is the future, and if Kanye can get us a seat at the table up there, then hats off to him. > "I want to announce that I am officially adding 'The First Vice President of the Earth' to my list of accolades, and I will be publicly endorsing Kanye West for President of Mars. I invite all of you Earthlings to join me in this exciting new chapter for mankind." Only time will tell how this bizarre episode plays out and what effect it could have on the tumultuous world of current politics. But one things for sure, whether you view Kanye West as a genius, or a madman, his announcement is sure to have shaken up the political landscape on Earth, and beyond...

prompt: You are a satirical writer. You need to write an article with headline: "More People Voluntarily Committing Themselves To Asylums To Escape Insanity Of Real World".
reference: U.S. - More people are voluntarily committing themselves to mental institutions in an attempt to escape the ever-increasing insanity of the real world.Thousands of people have checked themselves in at psychiatric wards across the country, claiming to be insane, in order to get away from the absolute insanity of everything that's happening outside."Oh yeah, I'm totally crazy, 100%," said Frank Zwygart as he checked himself in to an asylum in Arkham. "I think I'm Napoleon Bonaparte or whatever. Yep, totally insane.""That guy over there swinging the golf club at the orderly thinks we're living in a simulation, while Bob over in the corner thinks he's God," said recently committed man Frank Zwygart. "So yeah, it's a little less crazy than things out there. We don't worry about stuff like Kanye running for president, murder hornets, nunchuck bears, bubonic squirrels, World War 3, or getting doxxed for old tweets. And they've got lots of great board games in here.""Plus, Bob's actually a pretty cool guy once you get to know him," he added as he adjusted his straitjacket. "Actually, he's totally sane -- his beliefs make perfect sense to him. There's an internal logic to everything he believes, unlike some of the crazies you try to talk to out there in the crazy world."
candidate: **Breaking News:** Apparently, it has now become fashionable to voluntarily commit oneself to psychiatric facilities for respite from the stark raving madness of the real world. Who would have thought that the proverbial 'sanitarium' would become the new 'spa' or 'retreat' for the discerning urbanite?In recent months, there has been a startling increase in the number of people seeking asylum from the absurdities of everyday life. From businessmen to corporate climbers, from artists to entrepreneurs, it seems that everyone is yearning for a little taste of soft room to ease their tortured minds.Speaking to several self-confessed 'inmates', the reasons for their voluntary incarceration seem myriad. Mr. Franklin Müller, a bank manager from Frankfurt, declared that he couldn't take the perpetual pressure of dealing with the minutiae of other people's money anymore. "I realized that I was slowly going insane under the weight of other people's expectations. My wife suggested I seek help, and I realized a nice, relaxing stint in the old loony bin was just what I needed." For others, like Ms. Olivia Johnson, a rising young artist, it was the relentless churn of social media that pushed her over the edge. "I was doing perfectly well creating my art, but then I was expected to promote myself, engage with some of the mindless drivel I saw online, and ultimately sell myself as some sort of brand. It was all just too much. I heard the asylum bells ringing, and I couldn't resist their call." Some, like Mr. Magnus Johansson, a prominent environmental activist, even argue that such self-imposed asylum stays should be subsidized by the state. "Just think of it as a form of national service, but instead of sacrificing themselves in the military, young people should have the option to instead surrender themselves to preserving their own mental health. It would benefit us all in the long run." While such a spike in psychiatric admissions is usually associated with increased stress and an underlying epidemic of mental health issues, in this case, the facilities themselves seem to be thriving. Speaking to Dr. Monica Swartz, a leading psychiatrist at the illustrious Chastain Clinic in Denver, Colorado, she expressed pure surprise at the trend. "It's not often that we see such a surge in patients volunteering for admission, usually, it's quite the opposite. But I suppose it just goes to show that madness can be hidden deep, and sometimes, even the sane can go mad in the midst of it all." And so, it seems that while the real world continues its chaotic spin, a small pocket of sanity can be found within the padded walls of places offering respite from it all. Who'd have thought? This digital journalist, signing off from my own voluntary stint in said asylum. [Signature]
